sentence.text: Overexpression of protein targeting to membrane in gastric cancer was verified at both transcriptional and translational levels.
In addition, we verified the co-expression of and interplay between Rab3IP and regulation of transcription, DNA-templated during gastric cancer progression.

Cellular studies showed that protein targeting to membrane could induce an aggressive phenotype in gastric cancer cells and that its expression was correlated with markers of the epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT).
